name: macho-brace
effect: Held : When the holder would gain effort due to battle, it gains double that effort instead. Held in battle : Holder has half its Speed.
short_effect: Held: Holder gains double effort values from battles, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.
